name: @zhongbr/code-sandbox
description: Display JSX Code demos in your web pages easily.

scripts.main: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/index.tsx FORMATS=umd FILE_NAME=main OUT=./umd vite build
scripts.webcomponent: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/webcomponent.tsx FORMATS=umd FILE_NAME=webcomponent OUT=./umd vite build
scripts.babel-plugin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/plugins/babel/index.ts FORMATS=umd FILE_NAME=babel OUT=./umd/plugins vite build
scripts.react-plugin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/plugins/react/index.ts FORMATS=umd FILE_NAME=react OUT=./umd/plugins vite build
scripts.resolve-plugin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/plugins/resolve/index.ts FORMATS=umd FILE_NAME=resolve OUT=./umd/plugins vite build
scripts.build-umd:main: pnpm run build:iframe && pnpm run main
scripts.build-umd:webcomponent: pnpm run build:iframe && pnpm run webcomponent
scripts.build-es:iframe: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/iframe/iframe.ts FORMATS=es FILE_NAME=iframe OUT=./.cache/iframe vite build
scripts.build-umd: pnpm run build-es:iframe && cross-env CLEAN=true pnpm run webcomponent && cross-env CLEAN=false pnpm run babel-plugin && cross-env CLEAN=false pnpm run react-plugin && cross-env CLEAN=false pnpm run resolve-plugin && cross-env CLEAN=false pnpm run main
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=sandbox-development TARGET=src/index.tsx FORMATS=es,umd FILE_NAME=main OUT=./dist vite serve

author: zhongbr<zhongbr@icloud.com>(https://zhongbr.cn)
